name: Spot's Journey
description:
Spot's Journey is a 2D Platformer made for Godot Wild Jam #20.  Theme of the Game Jam was "Every end is a new beginning" with 3 wild cards, Easter Egg, Pacifist, and Dad Joke. If you are having issues with the browser version download the version for your OS. Thank you.

This is the second full game I have made. Attempted music and sound effects with this game.

Game made with Godot

Music made with Bosca Ceoil

Sound effects made with BFXR
